name: Slate
text: The Supreme Court is scheduled to hear Trump’s case against pre-existing condition protections one week after the election. But Congress already passed legislation saving the ACA. https://t.co/CwKsubycfb

name: Slate
text: This memo is more about the appearance of action than actual solutions, to impress upon Trump supporters that distant protests are a threat to them, even if they really aren’t. https://t.co/qNZ4aeqsQZ
